Dweb Browser>
Allow Don\'t allow Go To Setting Cancel Permission Required permission required fail, please click the "Go To Setting" to manual authorization Storage permission is required to provide the read/write operation of the local storage of data Calendar permission is required to read calendars and add/modify/delete calendars Camera permission is required to take photo and video Location permission is required to provide you with the finest information about your device Recording permission is required to call mic for recording Contact permission is required to access contact information and add/modify/delete contact information Call permission is required to make calls and view call records Sensor permission is required to obtain sensor related health conditions SMS permission is required to read SMS and create/modify/delete/send information Device permission is required to obtain information about the device
Tips Welcome to Dweb Browser. It will use the internet when you use it. Please consult your local operator for traffic costs. Please read the carefully before using Dweb Browser. You need to agree and accept all the terms before starting our service. 《privacy policy》 This product can only be used after agreeing to the relevant agreement Not Agree Agree exit app I Know
Update Prompt Due to the current Android System Webview version being too low, installation cannot proceed. \nPlease update the Android System Webview version of the system to (%s) and try again. OK Helper Documents
